description.zh: ML 行业联盟，制定 MLPerf 基准标准，发布 People's Speech、Multilingual Librispeech 等大规模数据集
description.en: ML industry consortium, defining MLPerf benchmark standards, releasing large-scale datasets like People's Speech and Multilingual Librispeech

authority_justification.zh: 由 Google、NVIDIA、Intel、Meta 等巨头联合成立，MLPerf 是 AI 硬件性能的行业标准
authority_justification.en: Founded by Google, NVIDIA, Intel, Meta, etc. MLPerf is the industry standard for AI hardware performance
